content: --व्यजनं a {%chowrie%} or fly-flapper (usually made of the tail of the yāk or {%Bos%} {%Grunniens%} and used as one of the royal insignia); यस्यार्थयुक्तं गिरिराजशब्दं कुर्वंति बालव्यजनैश्चमर्यः <ls>Ku. 1. 13</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 66</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 33</ls>, <ls n="R. 16.">57</ls>.
